<noinclude>

This is the '''Csp formfield/textarea''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Csp formfield/textarea
|name= (text) 
|required= (optional: "required")
|value= (text)
}}
</pre>

== Example ==
{{Csp formfield/textarea
|name=Comment
|value=Test abc 123
new line test
}}

Related templates:
{{#ask:[[~*Csp formfield/*]] 
|mainlabel=Page
|format=table 
|sort=Title
}}

</noinclude><includeonly><input type="textarea" 
name="{{{name|}}}"
class="form-control"
required="{{{required|}}}"
>{{{value|}}}</input></includeonly>
